title: NORTH CARIBOO AIR

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with NORTH CARIBOO AIR. The average
  contract duration was 0.22 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $63.3K.
  The longest contract was 1.05 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $500.0K.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '87'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '24'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '28%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '-5%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.58'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '-745.9K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.22'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '63.3K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '1.05'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '500.0K'
